name: Yuki Tsunoda
introduction: Yuki Tsunoda (  in Japanese; born 11 May 2000) is a Japanese racing driver, who made his FIA Formula One World Championship debut in 2021 for AlphaTauri.[1] A member of the Honda Formula Dream Project as well as the Red Bull Junior Team, Tsunoda graduated to F1 after claiming the Anthoine Hubert Award in the 2020 Formula 2 Championship.[2]
